decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing Talrand, Sky Summoner's ability to create a multitude of flying Drake tokens while controlling the game through a variety of counter spells, bounce effects, and card draw. By efficiently countering threats and bouncing problematic permanents back to their owner's hand, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while building its own aerial army. With a focus on tempo and resource denial, the deck seeks to outmaneuver opponents and secure victory through incremental advantage and overwhelming board presence. The combination of counterspells, bounce spells, and card draw allows the deck to maintain control of the battlefield and dictate the pace of the game.
